Description: This field is used to record a free text describing the time span of the documented temporal entity.
This field is used to record an event preceding the documented event which was undertaken in preparation for it.
This field is used to record the earliest possible start date for the documented temporal entity.
This field is used to record the latest possible start date for the documented temporal entity.
This field is used to record the earliest possible end date for the documented temporal entity.
This field is used to record the latest possible end date for the documented temporal entity.
This field is used to record the time value of the maximal known duration of the documented temporal entity.
This field is used to indicate the unit of the time value of the maximal known duration of the documented temporal entity.
This field is used to record the time value of the minimal known duration of the documented temporal entity.
This field is used to record the unit of the time value of the minimal known duration of the temporal entity.
This field is used to record a free text describing the time span of the documented temporal entity.
